channel.title: Tennis Elbow – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical’s Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow will reduce soreness and minimize the danger of further injury.

Whether suffering from Tennis Elbow (Lateral Epicondylitis), Golf Elbow (Medial Epicondylitis), Forearm Tendonitis, Arthritis, Cubital Tunnel or Ulnar Nerve pain, Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or pain resulting from Arm Hyperextension, our elbow brace has been aiding people with muscle strain for 40 years.

The post Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Provides adjustable, stabilizing protection, relief, and compression
  • Adjustable, velcro-backed tendon pad cushions place gentle pressure where & when you need it
  • Fasteners are adjustable for best fit
  • Fits both left and right elbows
  • Gel compression pad can be chilled for additional pain relief & recovery
Forearm Size Brace Size
12.5″ – 15″ Small
15″ – 17″ Medium
17″ – 20.5″ Large

The post Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical’s Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Neoprene Padding will reduce weariness and minimize the danger of further injury. Whether suffering from Tennis Elbow, Golf Elbow, or Carpal Tunnel, our elbow brace has been aiding people with muscle strain for 40 years. Complete with two velcro-backed neoprene pads, our brace is designed to alleviate muscle strain so you can keep performing.

The post Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Innovative design reduces pain
  • Two removable adjustable neoprene pads – place pads at specific pressure points
  • Adjustable velcro® strap for perfect fit, with durable nylon clip for easy on/easy off
Forearm Size Brace Size
12.5″ – 15″ Small
15″ – 17″ Medium
17″ – 20.5″ Large

The post Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Prevent Tennis Elbow pain with this pain relieving orthopedic solution, the Tennis Elbow Brace. It applies firm, consistent, yet gentle pressure to the tendons around the elbow joint. It will allow continued activity and allows for a full range of motion. Use the included hot/cold pack to treat pain and strain.

The post Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Comes with reusable gel hot/cold pack
  • Can be used with or without hot/cold pack
  • One size fits most

The post Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Elbow Cap, Healthgenie Compression Stabilizer, Adjustable And Pain Relief Support
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 20 Elbow Cap has been manufactured under the guidance of professionals at AT Surgical so that we can offer our clients with the very…

The post Elbow Cap, Healthgenie Compression Stabilizer, Adjustable And Pain Relief Support appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 20 Elbow Cap has been manufactured under the guidance of professionals at AT Surgical so that we can offer our clients with the very best. The Elbow Cap is efficiently designed and manufactured by our professionals using top quality raw material and highly developed technology.

It is designed as such that it applies stable pressure across your elbow joint, which provides ultimate pain relief from a variety of ailments including tendonitis, joint inflammation, tennis elbow, golf elbow, and other elbow pain.

With AT 20 Elbow Cap you’ll be able to tackle any activity life throws your way while ensuring you’re a step ahead in injury prevention.

Features:

  • The Elbow Cap is manufactured to provide superior support, comfort, and relief without you having to compromise on your mobility.
  • This is made of a material that is tight, form-fitting, and breathable compression. Thus maintaining joint stability regardless of activity, helping improve blood circulation and ease the pain while avoiding the itchiness common to neoprene supports.
  • Professionals at AT Surgical has taken the time to develop a specialized fabric blend for the AT 20 Elbow Cap offering all-around superior protection and support above and beyond what you’ve experienced before.
  • Though the AT 20 Elbow Cap has been designed and manufactured to aid pain relief, our Elbow supports are also the perfect fit for any activity that involves a great amount of stress on the joints like, Tennis, Golf, Baseball, Basketball, Crossfit, Weightlifting / Powerlifting, Volleyball and more!
  • You’ll be able to enjoy exceptional elbow support while still maintaining your peak performance and a full range of arm motion.

Specification:

  • Type: Adjustable Stabilising
  • Color: Available in different colors
  • Item Type: Body Shaper
  • Style: BodySuits
  • Material: Elastic
  • Size Type: Regular
  • Gender: Men/Women
  • Rise Type: High-Rise
  • Features: Slimming

Instructions

  • Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water
  • Roll in towel to absorb moisture and dry flat
  • Do not iron
  • Do not use dryer
  • Latex-free

Size Available:

Elbow Size Cap Size
7″ – 8″ Small
9″ – 10″ Medium
11″ – 12″ Large
13″ – 14″ Extra Large

The post Elbow Cap, Healthgenie Compression Stabilizer, Adjustable And Pain Relief Support appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Tennis Elbow Splint
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Alleviate Tennis Elbow pain with this pain relieving orthopedic solution, the Tennis Elbow Splint. It applies firm, consistent, yet gentle pressure to the tendons around the elbow joint, while allowing continued activity with a full range of motion.

  • Measure elbow at widest point for best fit
  • Supplementary relief for arthritic or rheumatic pain

The post Tennis Elbow Splint appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Features

  • Fully adjustable: one size fits most
  • Dual elastic straps from wrist and forearm
  • Rigid metal stay between straps helps reduce vibration
  • Velcro® closures

Instructions

  • Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water
  • Roll in towel to absorb moisture and dry flat
  • Do not iron
  • Do not use dryer
  • Latex free

The post Tennis Elbow Splint appeared first on AT Surgical.
